data.message: Hello dear people of Facebook There is something I would like to discuss with you. The thing is that I do not need to see in my News Feed that "person A" posted 'happy birthday' on the wall of my friend. Because Person A and I are not Facebook friends. #Youreallyneedbetterprivacysettings I do not mean this in a rude way, but this is my opinion about it. And I know you have a lot of work on FB. With kind regards.

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Isabel! You can view and adjust your News Feed preferences by following these steps from our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1T7bhde. -Sidney
